featured.text: 21 the climber is doing something very difficult, everything that he or she sees, hears, or 22 must come together to help in the work of climbing.
Only by entering this quiet mental state 25 a climber really do his or her best.

definition.zh_def: 攀登者，指從事攀爬活動的人，尤其是登山或攀岩的人。
definition.en_def: A person who climbs, especially as a sport or for recreation.
definition.example: The climber reached the summit after a challenging ascent.
